com.tombarrasso.android.wp7ui.drawables
Class WPDrawables

java.lang.Object
  com.tombarrasso.android.wp7ui.drawables.WPDrawables

public final class WPDrawables
extends java.lang.Object

Used to externalize the generation of Drawables. This decreases the dependency on XML and makes for easier code updates as well as the possibilty of bundling into a library.

Since:
07-12-2012

getRadioDrawable

public static final StateListDrawable getRadioDrawable()
Returns:
The button Drawable to be used in WPRadioButton. It contains the CircleDrawable for each possible state.
